reactor.core.publisher

接口 FluxSink<T>

  • 类型参数:
    T - the value type

    public interface FluxSink<T>
    Wrapper API around a downstream Subscriber for emitting any number of next signals followed by zero or one onError/onComplete.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 接口和说明
      static class  FluxSink.OverflowStrategy
      Enumeration for backpressure handling.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void complete() 
      Context currentContext()
      Return the current subscriber Context.
      void error(Throwable e) 
      boolean isCancelled()
      Returns true if the downstream cancelled the sequence.
      FluxSink<T> next(T t)
      Try emitting, might throw an unchecked exception.
      FluxSink<T> onCancel(Disposable d)
      Associates a disposable resource with this FluxSink that will be disposed in case the downstream cancels the sequence via Subscription.cancel().
      FluxSink<T> onDispose(Disposable d)
      Associates a disposable resource with this FluxSink that will be disposed on the first terminate signal which may be a cancel, complete or error signal.
      FluxSink<T> onRequest(LongConsumer consumer)
      Attaches a LongConsumer to this FluxSink that will be notified of any request to this sink.
      long requestedFromDownstream()
      The current outstanding request amount.

    • 方法详细资料

      • complete

        void complete()
        另请参阅:
        Subscriber.onComplete()

      • currentContext

        Context currentContext()
        Return the current subscriber Context.

        Context can be enriched via Flux.subscriberContext(Function) operator or directly by a child subscriber overriding CoreSubscriber.currentContext()

        返回:
        the current subscriber Context.

      • error

        void error(Throwable e)
        参数:
        e - the exception to signal, not null
        另请参阅:
        Subscriber.onError(Throwable)

      • next

        FluxSink<T> next(T t)
        Try emitting, might throw an unchecked exception.
        参数:
        t - the value to emit, not null
        另请参阅:
        Subscriber.onNext(Object)

      • requestedFromDownstream

        long requestedFromDownstream()
        The current outstanding request amount.
        返回:
        the current outstanding request amount

      • isCancelled

        boolean isCancelled()
        Returns true if the downstream cancelled the sequence.
        返回:
        true if the downstream cancelled the sequence

      • onRequest

        FluxSink<T> onRequest(LongConsumer consumer)
        Attaches a LongConsumer to this FluxSink that will be notified of any request to this sink.

        For push/pull sinks created using Flux.create(java.util.function.Consumer) or Flux.create(java.util.function.Consumer, FluxSink.OverflowStrategy), the consumer is invoked for every request to enable a hybrid backpressure-enabled push/pull model. When bridging with asynchronous listener-based APIs, the onRequest callback may be used to request more data from source if required and to manage backpressure by delivering data to sink only when requests are pending.

        For push-only sinks created using Flux.push(java.util.function.Consumer) or Flux.push(java.util.function.Consumer, FluxSink.OverflowStrategy), the consumer is invoked with an initial request of Long.MAX_VALUE when this method is invoked.

        参数:
        consumer - the consumer to invoke on each request
        返回:
        FluxSink with a consumer that is notified of requests

      • onCancel

        FluxSink<T> onCancel(Disposable d)
        Associates a disposable resource with this FluxSink that will be disposed in case the downstream cancels the sequence via Subscription.cancel().
        参数:
        d - the disposable callback to use
        返回:
        the FluxSink with resource to be disposed on cancel signal

      • onDispose

        FluxSink<T> onDispose(Disposable d)
        Associates a disposable resource with this FluxSink that will be disposed on the first terminate signal which may be a cancel, complete or error signal.
        参数:
        d - the disposable callback to use
        返回:
        the FluxSink with resource to be disposed on first terminate signal
